quotes.quote: Talent you have naturally. Skill is only developed by hours and hours and hours of beating on your craft.
All skills are perfected through the process of failure. Embrace loss as a necessary part of improvement.
Build your skills, not your resume.
Reading is the gateway skill that makes all other learning possible.
There is great skill in knowing how to conceal one's skill.
Skills are common. Talent is rare.
Lack of skill dictates economy of style.
The highest skill is the true judgment of values.
Happiness is a skill. It requires effort and time.
Leadership is a skill learned through many venues.
Skills rest in your mind, not in the props you make use of.
The greatest communication skill is paying value to others.
The most important skill to acquire now is learning how to learn.
Skill is the unified force of experience, intellect and passion in their operation.
Technical skill is mastery of complexity, while creativity is mastery of simplicity.
You can increase your problem-solving skills by honing your question-asking ability.
Drawing need not be the bones of art, but skill must always be the skeleton of accomplishment.
All skills are learnable.
Skills make you rich, not theories.
Skill is less important than awareness.
Confidence without skill is just emptiness.
Skill and confidence are an unconquered army.
Skills are really just circuits in your brain.
Service skills are the foundation for your success.
Art is skill; that is the first meaning of the word.
Motivation is a skill. It can be learned and practiced.
Your number one skill as a leader is the ability to influence.
Skills do not qualify or disqualify any of us from our purpose.
Relational skills are the most important abilities in leadership.
Skills can be taught. Character you either have or you don't have.
